Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM [News] WHERE [SeasonId] = @seasonId AND [DivisionId] = @divisionId AND [Week] = @week AND [PlayerId] = @playerId AND [TeamId] = @teamId ORDER BY [SeasonId] desc, [DivisionId], [Week] desc, [Id] desc RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int INSERT INTO [GameDetails] ([TeamId], [ManagerName], [CurrentSeasonId], [CurrentWeek]) VALUES (@teamId, @managerName,2020, 0)
SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DEClARE @result int INSERT INTO [News] ([SeasonId], [DivisionId], [Week], [PlayerId], [TeamId], [NewsText]) VALUES (@seasonId, @divisionId, @week, @playerId, @teamId, @newsText)
SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int INSERT INTO [Player] ([Name], [Age], [Rating], [Position], [TeamId], [Value], [Retired], [InjuredWeeks], [GameDetailsId]) VALUES (@name, @age, @rating, @position, @teamId, @value, @retired, @injuredWeeks, @gameDetailsId)
SET @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int INSERT INTO [PlayerAttributes] ([Aggression], [Crossing], [Defending], [Form], [Handling], [Happinness], [Morale], [Passing], [PlayerId], [Shooting], [Skills], [Speed], [Stamina], [Strength], [Tackling]) VALUES (@aggression, @crossing, @defending, @form, @handling, @happinness, @morale, @passing, @playerId, @shooting, @skills, @speed, @stamina, @strength, @tackling) SET @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int INSERT INTO [PlayerStats] ([Assists], [CleanSheets], [Games], [Goals], [PlayerId]) VALUES (@assists, @cleanSheets, @games, @goals, @playerId) SET @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int
INSERT INTO [Season] ([GameDetailsId], [StartYear], [Completed]) VALUES (@gameDetailsId, @startYear, @completed)
SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int INSERT INTO [Team] ([Cash], [DivisionId], [Name], [StadiumCapacity], [YearFormed], [GameDetailsId]) VALUES (@cash, @divisionId, @name, @stadiumCapacity, @yearFormed, @gameDetailsId)
SET @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int
UPDATE [Player] SET [Name] = @name, [Rating] = @rating, [Age] = @age, [Position] = @position, [TeamId] = @teamId, [Value] = @value, [Retired] = @retired, [InjuredWeeks] = @injuredWeeks WHERE [Id] = @id IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int UPDATE [PlayerAttributes] SET [Aggression] = @aggression, [Crossing] = @crossing, [Defending] = @defending, [Form] = @form, [Handling] = @handling, [Happinness] = @happinness, [Morale] = @morale, [Passing] = @passing, [Shooting] = @shooting, [Skills] = @skills, [Speed] = @speed, [Stamina] = @stamina, [Strength] = @strength, [Tackling] = @tackling WHERE [PlayerId] = @playerId
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @result int
UPDATE [PlayerStats] SET [Assists] = @assists, [CleanSheets] = @cleanSheets, [Games] = @games, [Goals] = @goals WHERE [PlayerId] = @playerId
IF @@ERROR = 0 SET @result = 1 ELSE SET @result = 0
RETURN @result
